title: City Pharma and Diagnostic Centre — Full Multi-Page Website

requirements.text: Configure Tailwind CSS with a custom theme extending colors: orange shades (#EA580C as orange-600, #F97316 as orange-500) and maroon shades (#7F1D1D as maroon-900, #991B1B as maroon-800, #B91C1C as maroon-700). Install and configure Framer Motion and Lucide React as dependencies. Set up React Router v6 with routes for '/', '/medicine', '/pathology', '/ultrasound', and '/doctors'.

quotes: Tailwind CSS with a custom color palette of orange (#EA580C, #F97316) and maroon (#7F1D1D, #991B1B, #B91C1C)
React 18 + React Router v6
Framer Motion for all page transitions and element animations
Lucide React for icons

acceptanceCriteria: tailwind.config extends theme with the specified orange and maroon color values
React Router v6 is configured with all 5 routes rendering their respective page components
Framer Motion and Lucide React are importable without errors

requirements.text: Create a global sticky header component that displays the logo text 'CITY PHARMA' on the left, navigation links to all 5 pages (Home, Medicine, Pathology, Ultrasound, Doctors) on desktop, and a hamburger menu toggling a mobile nav drawer on small screens. Include a continuously animating SVG heartbeat polyline in the header. Style with the orange/maroon palette.

requirements.text: Build the Home page ('/'). Include: (1) A hero banner with animated SVG medical graphics — floating pills, a stethoscope icon, and a heartbeat line animated via SVG stroke-dasharray/stroke-dashoffset using Framer Motion — plus introductory text emphasizing quality healthcare. (2) The phone number 9931918438 prominently displayed. (3) Three CTA buttons: 'Book Now' (links to /pathology), 'Contact Us' (links to tel:9931918438), 'Order Medicine' (links to /medicine). (4) Four quick-access service cards for Medicine, Pathology, Ultrasound, and Doctor Consultation, each with a Lucide React icon and a React Router link to the corresponding page. (5) A testimonials section with 3 patient quotes. (6) A newsletter signup section with an email input and submit button (frontend-only, shows success message on submit).

requirements.text: Build the Medicine Services page ('/medicine'). Include: (1) A hero section with animated delivery truck and pill SVG/Lucide icons using Framer Motion. (2) A service description with an animated pulsing badge reading 'Free Delivery within 20 km'. (3) A medicine request form with fields: Name (text), Contact Number (tel), Address (textarea), Medicine Name (text), Prescription Upload (file input), Preferred Delivery Time (time or select). On submit, show a success confirmation message (no backend call). (4) An animated delivery process steps section showing icons with connecting arrows (e.g., Order → Verify → Pack → Deliver) animated with Framer Motion.

requirements.text: Build the Pathology Services page ('/pathology'). Include: (1) A hero section with animated lab beaker/flask SVG or Lucide icons using Framer Motion. (2) A card-based pricing table for blood tests: CBC (₹200), Lipid Profile (₹500), Blood Sugar Fasting (₹80), Blood Sugar PP (₹80), HbA1c (₹350), Thyroid Profile (₹450), Liver Function Test (₹600), Kidney Function Test (₹600), Complete Hemogram (₹300); and urine tests: Routine Urine Examination (₹100), Urine Culture & Sensitivity (₹400), Urine Pregnancy Test (₹150). (3) An online booking form with fields: Name (text), Contact (tel), Test Selection (multi-select from the listed tests), Date & Time (date + time inputs), Prescription Upload (file input). On submit, display a success confirmation message (no backend call).

requirements.text: Build the Our Doctors page ('/doctors'). Display 8 doctor cards in a responsive grid. Each card contains: an avatar image loaded from https://ui-avatars.com/api/?name=DOCTOR_NAME&background=991B1B&color=fff&size=200 (replacing DOCTOR_NAME with the doctor's name URL-encoded), the doctor's name, a specialization badge, a brief auto-generated bio (1–2 sentences), and a 'Call Now' button linking to tel:9931918438. Apply Framer Motion hover effects (scale + shadow) to each card. Doctors: (1) Dr. Swati Lal – Gynaecologist, (2) Dr. Faruque – Child Specialist, Diabetic Specialist, General Physician, (3) Dr. Parmeshwar Lal – Senior General Physician, (4) Dr. Rahul Yogendar Raj – Orthopaedic Specialist, (5) Dr. Anup Tirkey – Dermatologist & Cosmetic Specialist, (6) Dr. SK Choudhary – Senior Dermatologist, (7) Dr. RL Munda – Senior General Physician & Child Specialist, (8) Dr. Mayank Sahan Sharma – Gastroenterologist.

requirements.text: Apply Framer Motion page transition animations globally so each route change fades/slides in the new page content. Ensure all pages are fully mobile-first responsive using Tailwind CSS responsive prefixes (sm:, md:, lg:). All forms must use controlled React state with validation feedback and a visible success state on submission.

quotes: Framer Motion for all page transitions and element animations
Fully responsive: mobile-first
All forms are frontend-only with controlled state and success message on submit

acceptanceCriteria: Navigating between routes triggers a visible Framer Motion transition animation
All pages render correctly without horizontal overflow on a 375px viewport
Every form on the site shows a success message after submission without a page reload

constraints: All forms are frontend-only — no backend canister calls for form submissions
Phone number 9931918438 must be used consistently across all pages and links
Avatar images must use the ui-avatars.com URL pattern with background=991B1B&color=fff&size=200
Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui
Use import.meta.env pattern for any environment variables (Vite-based setup)
nonGoals: Backend Motoko canister logic or data persistence
Actual prescription or file upload processing (file input is UI-only)
Email or SMS notifications from form submissions
External API integrations beyond ui-avatars.com image URLs
